var fib = function(n) {
    const MOD = 1000000007;
    if (n < 2) {
        return n;
    }
    let p = 0, q = 0, r = 1;
    for (let i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
        p = q; 
        q = r; 
        r = (p + q) % MOD;
    }
    return r;
};
